# Guidelines

```{r install_examplePkgs, include=FALSE}
pkgs <- list.files(file.path("./inst/examplePkgs"), full.names = TRUE)
for (pkg in pkgs) {
  devtools::install(pkg)
}
```

```{r, echo=FALSE, results='asis'}
guides <- list.files(file.path("./inst/guidelines"), full.names = TRUE)
for (guide in guides) {
  guide_files <- list.files(guide, full.names = TRUE)
  for (guide_file in guide_files) {
    cat(
      knitr::knit_child(
        guide_file,
        quiet = TRUE
      ) 
    ) 
  }
}
```
